Uses of Interface
com.bandwidth.voice.bxml.verbs.AudioProducer

Packages that use AudioProducer 
Package Description
com.bandwidth.voice.bxml.verbs  

  • Uses of AudioProducer in com.bandwidth.voice.bxml.verbs

    Classes in com.bandwidth.voice.bxml.verbs that implement AudioProducer 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  PlayAudio
    The PlayAudio verb is used to play an audio file in the call.
    class  SpeakSentence
    The SpeakSentence verb translates text to speech and plays the resulting audio on the call
    Attributes of the speaker may be changed using these values.
    Methods in com.bandwidth.voice.bxml.verbs with parameters of type AudioProducer 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Gather.GatherBuilder Gather.GatherBuilder.audioProducer​(AudioProducer audioProducer)
    (optional) Using the AudioProducer inside the Gather verb will play the media until a digit is received.
    Method parameters in com.bandwidth.voice.bxml.verbs with type arguments of type AudioProducer 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Gather.GatherBuilder Gather.GatherBuilder.audioProducer​(java.util.List<AudioProducer> audioProducers)
    (optional) Using the AudioProducers inside the Gather verb will play the media(s) until a digit is received.
